thread.title: £1,500 for a meet and greet dinner with The Terminator | Central
thread.title_full: £1,500 for a meet and greet dinner with The Terminator | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: £1,500 for a meet and greet dinner with The Terminator | Central
text:
If you fancy having a meet and greet dinner with The Terminator, it will set you back £1,500.
Arnie is heading to Birmingham next year Credit: OSCAR GONZALEZ FUENTES / Demotix/Demotix/Press Association Images Hollywood superstar, Arnold Schwarzenegger, is coming to Birmingham for a black-tie dinner in January, and you'll have to dig deep into your pockets if you want to meet him.
You can go along to the event without the meet and greet dinner though, which will cost a little less, at £95.
The former Mr Universe who also served two terms as Governor of California is back in his most famous role as The Terminator, as the latest film hit the big screen this year.
Schwarzenegger at the European Premiere of Terminator Genesys Credit: JÃ¶rg Carstensen/DPA/Press Association Images Most recently, he has also replaced Donald Trump as the new face of The Apprentice TV show in America.
An Experience with Arnold Schwarzenegger takes place at Birmingham's ICC on 21 January.
Only 20 people will get their hands on the £1,500 'platinum ticket', with others able to buy a photo opportunity, or just go along to listen to the 68-year-old Austrian discuss his life story.
Tickets go on sale on Friday.
Last updated Wed 7 Oct 2015 Entertainment Birmingham West Midlands
